ComicInfo.Title: The Musketeers
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Three Musketeers
Taking over after the death of her mother Sela, Skye Mathers is the new Guardian of the Nexus. With the help of Shang, her mentor, she is learning the extent of her new powers, and trying to figure out the mystery of her connection to the book of Fairy Tales.
Now with Merlin in control of the book of Fairy Tales, the Age of Camelot has been brought to the Grimm Universe. Skye must find a way to get her book back and put an end to the misuse of its power on our world.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sheldon Goh & Ylenia Di Napoli | 1 | B | Cover B | Caanan White & Ceci de la Cruz | 2 | C | Cover C | Derlis Santacruz & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Julius Abrera & Grostieta | 4 | E | Quarterly Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Unlisted | Missing | F | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Unlisted | Missing | G | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 50 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | H | C2E2 Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 300 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Hedwin Zaldivar (c) | Missing |
